channel.title: OpenCV on Kaumil Trivedi
channel.description: Recent content in OpenCV on Kaumil Trivedi

item.title: Emof_AI
item.description: Emof_ai is a web API which takes a sample video as an input, detects all the faces in each frame of the video and performs classfication. It classifies the emotion of the face into 1 of 8 emotions viz anger, disgust, fear, happy, sad, surprise, neutral and none(this is when there are no faces detected in the frame at all and hence none means no emotion detected in the frame at all).
